title: Android app deals of the day: Siege of Dragonspear, SPHAZE puzzler, and more
content:
All of Thursday’s best Google Play Android app deals are now up for the taking below. They also join today’s offers on Pixel 4, this official 30W Google USB-C charging bundle, and a new low on the Samsung Chromebook Go. As for the apps, we have some freebie icon packs, the SPHAZE: Sci-fi puzzle game, Dead Bunker 3: On a Surface, and Siege of Dragonspear, among others. Hit the jump for a closer look at today’s best Android game and app deals. 

more…
